SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM fileboard
OR id LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%'
OR title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
OR orgFileName LIKE '%'||#{orgFileName}||'%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT num,id,title,orgFileName,fileSize,downCount,regdate FROM fileboard
OR id LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%'
OR title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
OR orgFileName LIKE '%'||#{orgFileName}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1 )
WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNum} AND rnum <= #{endRowNum}
SELECT num,id,title,orgFileName,saveFileName,fileSize, downCount,regdate FROM fileboard WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fileboard (num, id, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, regdate) VALUES(fileboard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{orgFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE)
